gov.fnal.ppd.dd.util

Class ObjectSigningRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.dd.util.ObjectSigningRepository

  • public class ObjectSigningRepository
extends Object
    I am not sure about this class yet. It seems that the class ObjectSigning is doing two sublty differnt things that should probably be separated: (1) It is an object that can be signed; (2) it checks the validity of an object's signature. At this time I have these so intertwined that I cannot them easily. (Or it may be that these two functions are in my imagnination.)
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation
